import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { deleteActivity } from '../features/acitivity/activitySlice' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import image from "../images/mikel-parera-activity.jpg"; function ActivityItem({ exercise, token }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() function deleteUserActivity(e) { e.preventDefault() dispatch(deleteActivity(exercise, token)) } return (



Exercice Name Duration Date
{exercise.description} {exercise.duration} minutes {Date(exercise.date.toDateString)}
) } export default ActivityItem
